sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button v-if="!link" :class="type">
    <slot></slot>
  </button>

  <button v-else :to="to" :class="type">
    <slot></slot>
  </button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    props: {
       type: {
            type: String,
            required: false,
            default: null,
       },

       link: {
        type: Boolean,
        required: false,
        default: false
       },

       to: {
        type: String,
        required: false,
        default: '/'
       }
    }

}
</script>

<style scoped>

button {
    border: none;
    border-radius: .5vw;
    padding: .2vw 3vw;
    box-shadow: rgba(78, 170, 227, 0.25) 0px 2px 2px;
    
}
.filled {
    background-color: var(--light-suplementar);
    color: var(--white);

}

.filled:hover,
.filled
</style>
